H0.text: They are pure, the property that most rocks and minerals share, as rocks and minerals are common materials found on Earth.

H1.text: They are solid is the property that most rocks and minerals, common materials found on Earth, share.

H2.text: They are liquid is the property that most rocks and minerals share, as rocks and minerals are common materials found on Earth.

H3.text: They are magnetic is the property that most rocks and minerals share, as common materials found on Earth.

A4.text: In geology and mineralogy, a mineral or mineral species is, broadly speaking, a solid substance

A5.text: A rock is any bulk solid geologic material
